entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Churchill Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:46 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -35.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Falls 03:00 AM AST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -35.7°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -38.8°C
Wind: ENE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 12:15 AM AST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 12:15 AM AST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 40%
